verses.verse: SHa'ul <S%G3972><s%>, an emissary <S%G652><s%> of Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Timotheus <S%G5095><s%> our brother <S%G80><s%>,

To the saints <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> which are at <S%G1722><s%> Colosse <S%G2857><s%>: Grace <S%G5485><s%> be unto you <S%G5213><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%>, from <S%G575><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>.

We give thanks <S%G2168><s%> <S%G5719><s%> to 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> YY <S%G2962><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, davvening <S%G4336><s%> <S%G5740><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>,

Since we heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5660><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of the love <S%G26><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> ye have to <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the saints <S%G40><s%>,

For <S%G1223><s%> the hope <S%G1680><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is laid up <S%G606><s%> <S%G5740><s%> for you <S%G5213><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, whereof <S%G3739><s%> ye heard before <S%G4257><s%> <S%G5656><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of the truth <S%G225><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%>;

Which <S%G3588><s%> is come <S%G3918><s%> <S%G5752><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, as <S%G2531><s%> <S%G2532><s%> it is in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> bringeth forth fruit <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> <S%G2592><s%> <S%G5734><s%>, as <S%G2531><s%> it doth also <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, since <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3739><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> ye heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%> of it, and <S%G2532><s%> knew <S%G1921><s%> <S%G5627><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> truth <S%G225><s%>:

As <S%G2531><s%> ye <S%G3129><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> learned <S%G3129><s%> <S%G5627><s%> of <S%G575><s%> Epaphras <S%G1889><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> dear <S%G27><s%> fellowservant <S%G4889><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> a faithful <S%G4103><s%> minister <S%G1249><s%> of Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>;
Who <S%G3588><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> declared <S%G1213><s%> <S%G5660><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> love <S%G26><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>.

For <S%G1223><s%> this cause <S%G5124><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>, since <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3739><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> we heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%> it, do <S%G3973><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> cease <S%G3973><s%> <S%G5731><s%> to pray <S%G4336><s%> <S%G5740><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to desire <S%G154><s%> <S%G5734><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye might be filled <S%G4137><s%> <S%G5686><s%> with the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> will <S%G2307><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%> understanding <S%G4907><s%>;

That ye <S%G5209><s%> might walk <S%G4043><s%> <S%G5658><s%> worthy <S%G516><s%> of the YY <S%G2962><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> pleasing <S%G699><s%>, being fruitful <S%G2592><s%> <S%G5723><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> work <S%G2041><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> increasing <S%G837><s%> <S%G5746><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>;

Strengthened <S%G1412><s%> <S%G5746><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> might <S%G1411><s%>, according to <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G846><s%> glorious <S%G1391><s%> power <S%G2904><s%>, unto <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> patience <S%G5281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> longsuffering <S%G3115><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> joyfulness <S%G5479><s%>;

Giving thanks <S%G2168><s%> <S%G5723><s%> unto the Father <S%G3962><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> hath made <S%G2427><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> meet <S%G2427><s%> <S%G5660><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> be partakers <S%G3310><s%> of the inheritance <S%G2819><s%> of the saints <S%G40><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> light <S%G5457><s%>:

Who <S%G3739><s%> hath delivered <S%G4506><s%> <S%G5673><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the power <S%G1849><s%> of darkness <S%G4655><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> hath translated <S%G3179><s%> <S%G5656><s%> us into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> dear <S%G26><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%>:

In <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> redemption <S%G629><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> his <S%G846><s%> blood <S%G129><s%>, even the forgiveness <S%G859><s%> of sins <S%G266><s%>:

Who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the image <S%G1504><s%> of the invisible <S%G517><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, the firstborn <S%G4416><s%> of every <S%G3956><s%> creature <S%G2937><s%>:

For <S%G3754><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> were <S%G2936><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> created <S%G2936><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, that are in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that are in <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%>, visible <S%G3707><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> invisible <S%G517><s%>, whether <S%G1535><s%> they be thrones <S%G2362><s%>, or <S%G1535><s%> dominions <S%G2963><s%>, or <S%G1535><s%> principalities <S%G746><s%>, or <S%G1535><s%> powers <S%G1849><s%>: all things <S%G3956><s%> were created <S%G2936><s%> <S%G5769><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> consist <S%G4921><s%> <S%G5758><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the head <S%G2776><s%> of the body <S%G4983><s%>, the Congregation <S%G1577><s%>: who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%>, the firstborn <S%G4416><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things he <S%G846><s%> might have <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5638><s%> the preeminence <S%G4409><s%> <S%G5723><s%>.

For it pleased <S%G2106><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the Father that <S%G3754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> should <S%G2730><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> fulness <S%G4138><s%> dwell <S%G2730><s%> <S%G5658><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%>, having made peace <S%G1517><s%> <S%G5660><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> execution stake <S%G4716><s%>, by <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to reconcile <S%G604><s%> <S%G5658><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> himself <S%G846><s%>; by <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, I say, whether <S%G1535><s%> they be things in <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%>, or <S%G1535><s%> things in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, that were <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> sometime <S%G4218><s%> alienated <S%G526><s%> <S%G5772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> enemies <S%G2190><s%> in your mind <S%G1271><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> wicked <S%G4190><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>, yet <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> hath he reconciled <S%G604><s%> <S%G5656><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>, to present <S%G3936><s%> <S%G5658><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> unblameable <S%G299><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> unreproveable <S%G410><s%> in his <S%G846><s%> sight <S%G2714><s%>:

If <S%G1489><s%> ye continue <S%G1961><s%> <S%G5719><s%> in the faith <S%G4102><s%> grounded <S%G2311><s%> <S%G5772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> settled <S%G1476><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> be not <S%G3361><s%> moved away <S%G3334><s%> <S%G5746><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the hope <S%G1680><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> ye have heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, and which <S%G3588><s%> was preached <S%G2784><s%> <S%G5685><s%> to <S%G1722><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> creature <S%G2937><s%> which is under <S%G5259><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>; whereof <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> SHa'ul <S%G3972><s%> am made <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> a minister <S%G1249><s%>;

Who <S%G3739><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> rejoice <S%G5463><s%> <S%G5719><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> sufferings <S%G3804><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> fill up <S%G466><s%> <S%G5719><s%> that which is behind <S%G5303><s%> of the afflictions <S%G2347><s%> of Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> his <S%G846><s%> body's <S%G4983><s%> sake <S%G5228><s%>, which is <S%G3603><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the Congregation <S%G1577><s%>:

Whereof <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am made <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> a minister <S%G1249><s%>, according to <S%G2596><s%> the dispensation <S%G3622><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is given <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5685><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, to fulfil <S%G4137><s%> <S%G5658><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>;

Havahn the mystery <S%G3466><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> hath been hid <S%G613><s%> <S%G5772><s%> from <S%G575><s%> ages <S%G165><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> generations <S%G1074><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> is made manifest <S%G5319><s%> <S%G5681><s%> to his <S%G846><s%> saints <S%G40><s%>:

To whom <S%G3739><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> would <S%G2309><s%> <S%G5656><s%> make known <S%G1107><s%> <S%G5658><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is the riches <S%G4149><s%> of the glory <S%G1391><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> mystery <S%G3466><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the goyim <S%G1484><s%>; which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, the hope <S%G1680><s%> of glory <S%G1391><s%>:

Whom <S%G3739><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> preach <S%G2605><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, warning <S%G3560><s%> <S%G5723><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> teaching <S%G1321><s%> <S%G5723><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> we may present <S%G3936><s%> <S%G5661><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%> perfect <S%G5046><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>:

Whereunto <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G2872><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> labour <S%G2872><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, striving <S%G75><s%> <S%G5740><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G846><s%> working <S%G1753><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> worketh <S%G1754><s%> <S%G5734><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G1698><s%> mightily <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1411><s%>.
